Rank.Description: When receiving a single target heal, you have a 10% chance of gaining a Pact.
When receiving a single target heal, you have a 20% chance of gaining a Pact.
When receiving a single target heal, you have a 30% chance of gaining a Pact.
Generates additional threat to up to 10 nearby enemies based on Endurance whenever a Pact is gained.

Reckless Strike and Ragestorm now deal weapon plus 0.3% of your Attack Power as additional Air damage for each active Pact. Devouring Blow deals 0.3% of your Attack Power for each Attack Point used per Pact as additional Air damage.

Reckless Strike and Ragestorm now deal weapon plus 0.6% of your Attack Power as additional Air damage for each active Pact. Devouring Blow deals 0.6% of your Attack Power for each Attack Point used per Pact as additional Air damage.

Reckless Strike and Ragestorm now deal weapon plus 0.9% of your Attack Power as additional Air damage for each active Pact. Devouring Blow deals 0.9% of your Attack Power for each Attack Point used per Pact as additional Air damage.

Reckless Strike and Ragestorm now deal weapon plus 1.2% of your Attack Power as additional Air damage for each active Pact. Devouring Blow deals 1.2% of your Attack Power for each Attack Point used per Pact as additional Air damage.

Reckless Strike and Ragestorm now deal weapon plus 1.5% of your Attack Power as additional Air damage for each active Pact. Devouring Blow deals 1.5% of your Attack Power for each Attack Point used per Pact as additional Air damage.
Pact duration is increased by 3 seconds.
Pact duration is increased by 6 seconds.
Pact duration is increased by 9 seconds.
Pact duration is increased by 12 seconds.
Pact duration is increased by 15 seconds.
Increases the non Spell damage reduction on Void by 2%, and the Spell damage reduction on Void by 4%. Increases outgoing damage by 5%.
Increases the non Spell damage reduction on Void by 4%, and the Spell damage reduction on Void by 8%. Increases outgoing damage by 10%.
Increases all Resists by 1%.
Increases all Resists by 2%.
Increases all Resists by 3%.
Increases all Resists by 4%.
Increases all Resists by 5%.
Abilities that consume Pacts cost 2 less Power.
Abilities that consume Pacts cost 4 less Power.
Abilities that consume Pacts cost 6 less Power.

Ability.Description: Hurl the enemy back 15 meters. This ability awards 1 Attack Point.

Rank.Description: Increases Endurance by 2%.
Increases Endurance by 4%.
Increases Endurance by 6%.
Increases Endurance by 8%.
Increases Endurance by 10%.

Ability.Description: Removes 1 Buff. Applies 1 Pact to the Warrior.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Spell Sunder ability.
Increases Armor by 2%.
Increases Armor by 4%.
Increases Armor by 6%.

Ability.Description: Removes 1 Curse. Applies 1 Pact to the Warrior.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Spellbreaker ability.
Furious Rage silences the enemy for 4 seconds on a successful interrupt.

Ability.Description: Teleports the enemy to the Warrior. Roots for 1.5s. Forces the enemy to attack the Warrior for 3s. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Rift Summon ability.
Reduces incoming spell damage by 15% for 1.5 seconds after casting Spellbreaker.
Reduces incoming spell damage by 15% for 3 seconds after casting Spellbreaker.
When gaining a pact from Void, Spellbreaker, Spell Sunder or Unstable Reaction you have a 10% chance to gain an additional Pact.
When gaining a pact from Void, Spellbreaker, Spell Sunder or Unstable Reaction you have a 20% chance to gain an additional Pact.
When gaining a pact from Void, Spellbreaker, Spell Sunder or Unstable Reaction you have a 30% chance to gain an additional Pact.
Increases damage by 5%. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 1%.
Increases damage by 10%. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 2%.

Ability.Description: Consume up to 5 Pacts to absorb 162 damage per Pact consumed. Lasts 30s.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Rift Shield ability.
Increases the range of Summons by 5 meters.
Increases the range of Summons by 10 meters.
Increases Absorption value of Absorb shields by 7%. Increases all non Physical damage by 5%.
Increases Absorption value of Absorb shields by 14%. Increases all non Physical damage by 10%.
Increases Absorption value of Absorb shields by 21%. Increases all non Physical damage by 15%.
Gaining a Pact has a 10% chance to refresh your Summon abilities.

Ability.Description: Consumes up to 3 pacts to deal 173 Air damage modified for each Pact consumed to up to 5 enemies in front of the Warrior.

Rank.Description: Increases the range of Discharge, Spark, Shock, and Unstable Reaction by 5. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 4%.

Ability.Description: Consume 1 Pact each second for a maximum of 6s to Absorb 416 damage per stack, and awarding 1 Attack Point every 2 seconds. Absorbs last 15s.
Movement speed is increased by 1% per active Pact. Damage taken from spells is reduced by 0.5% per Pact. Lasts 1h.

Rank.Description: Gain a Pact every 9 seconds while in combat, and increases the damage of Destructive Forces by 15%.
Gain a Pact every 6 seconds while in combat, and increases the damage of Destructive Forces by 35%.
Gain a Pact every 3 seconds while in combat, and increases the damage of Destructive Forces by 50%.

Ability.Description: Teleports up to 5 enemies near the targeted enemy to the Warrior. Roots affected enemies for 1.5s. Forces affected enemies to attack the Warrior for 3s. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Absorbs damage based on Attack Points:
1 Point: 29 damage. 2 Points: 70 damage. 3 Points: 132 damage.

Consume up to 5 Pacts to reduce incoming damage by 4% per pact consumed for 4s. Adds an absorption shield that absorbs 25 damage per Pact consumed, on up to 5 party or raid members. Lasts 30s. Does not stack with Shield Defense or Crest of Entropy.

Consume up to 5 Pacts to reduce incoming damage by 4% per pact consumed for 4s. Adds an absorption shield that absorbs 29 damage per Pact consumed, on up to 5 party or raid members. Lasts 30s. Does not stack with Shield Defense or Crest of Entropy.

Consume up to 5 Pacts to reduce incoming damage by 4% per pact consumed for 4s. Adds an absorption shield that absorbs 32 damage per Pact consumed, on up to 5 party or raid members. Lasts 30s. Does not stack with Shield Defense or Crest of Entropy.
